resources.string: "This app will let you know the films that will be seen in the festival, including Doctor Strange, Five Nights at Rocio's, Blue Lobster 2: Ahora es personal, AND MANY MORE :D "
"This project is distributed under the GNU GPL 3.0 License, as we firmly believe in free and open-source projects. "

Our company consists of a small film festival where you can watch the best movies of the decade. The mobile app dev team is made up of two students who work for us completely legally. :D Below you can find information about them.
\"I study to become a programmer and publish an independent video game in the not-so-distant future.\"
\"I love programming; I am hardworking and a perfectionist. In the future, I would like to work in game development.\"
Do you want to close the app?
There are films that are currently not available
